overview: Some tourists come to France for the food, the fine wine, and the culture. The smart folks come for the sex - and the French prove that lust is their ultimate tourist attraction! Scenarios jump from a swinging restaurant where a Countess enjoys a mouth-watering item that isn't on the menu - to a stud who puts his mountain-climbing skills to good use on two very buxom women! And that's just the beginning of your personal tour through the world's lustiest land... French Heat will show you all the hot spots!
title: French Heat
